/* commonMapper.selectOrderAmtQty */ SELECT SUM(GD_QTY) AS TOTAL_QTY ,SUM(GD_QTY*OD_AMT) AS TOTAL_AMT
,TO_DATE(OD_DATE) AS OD_DATE
FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE OD_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDt}) AND TO_DATE(#{endDt})+0.99999
GROUP BY TO_DATE(OD_DATE) ORDER BY TO_DATE(OD_DATE)

/* commonMapper.selectBestSeller */ SELECT G.GD_NO ,G.GD_GP ,G.GD_SP ,G.GD_NM ,G.GD_WR ,G.GD_IMG ,NVL(O.SEL_QTY,0) AS SEL_QTY FROM GOODS_INFO G LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GD_NO ,SUM(NVL(GD_QTY,0))AS SEL_QTY FROM ORDER_INFO GROUP BY GD_NO ) O ON O.GD_NO = G.GD_NO WHERE G.GD_GP = 'bestBook'
/* commonMapper.selectRecomnSeller */ SELECT GD_NO ,GD_GP ,GD_SP ,GD_NM ,GD_WR ,GD_IMG FROM GOODS_INFO WHERE GD_GP = #{gpCd}
